title: Atlantean Syndra W Missing particles
body:
I MEANT HER E not W

Something is definitely not right here .-. http://giphy.com/gifs/3o85xlkfJaLjyZGflK/html5

this is what her e is suppose to look like 
[img]http://i.imgur.com/GUtWhQ2.jpg[/img]

replies.body:
Hey Asul,

I've gone ahead and checked out Atlantean Syndra on high graphics settings (per your comment above). Her (E) - Scatter the Weak appears to be working as intended. I've attached a screenshot to show you what I'm seeing. I've also attached what I'm seeing in regards to her (W) - Force of Will. 

If this isn't what you're seeing, please let me know and we can look into it further. :]
I didn't forget! I poked someone today to take a look at it and we're working on a fix. :]

I went ahead and played her again... .-. this time I took a video of it. I don't know, it is either on my end or something else.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0aEEuRXGYo4
> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=pRQ7jRpy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-24T16:45:53.170+0000)
>
> Hey Asul,
> 
> I've gone ahead and checked out Atlantean Syndra on high graphics settings (per your comment above). Her (E) - Scatter the Weak appears to be working as intended. I've attached a screenshot to show you what I'm seeing. I've also attached what I'm seeing in regards to her (W) - Force of Will. 
> 
> If this isn't what you're seeing, please let me know and we can look into it further. :]

I'm gonna go ahead and try to reinstall league, it might have had problems during updates. See if it fixes it.
You could also try a System Repair rather than installing again completely. Let me know if you're still having issues and we can another look.

ok uh... I went ahead and rebooted/restarted/repaired my system.... after that I downloaded League.... and checked the skin again. It seems like nothing changed, her e still looks the same. Some of her abilities I think are missing some little particles as well (it was already like this before I repaired my system), it's  not that noticeable though, I just feel like they are missing some bits of particles. 

I think there is something wrong on my end. Do you think my video card is corrupted? 

From the video, I decided to take Screen Shots and look at the difference of the particles between low graphics to high graphics.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/43S7AhN.png[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/0jduhNy.jpg[/img]
Lower settings will have less particles - that's intended. Are you playing on lower settings, or high?

normally high. I decided to do the side by side comparison because I wanted to see the difference between their quality. I don't see any difference on both low and high, other than shadows and a few particles added on high.

Okay!  I figured it out! 

On live currently, it's bugged. PBE has a fix for it (it works totally fine), which means, next patch, this should be fixed! 

Which means, your graphics card is a-okay, so no worries there.
oh my... I got so worried I started looking for a  new graphics card .-. thank you for this news katey! <3

I went ahead and played her again... .-. this time I took a video of it. I don't know, it is either on my end or something else.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0aEEuRXGYo4
It's not her W, it's E. Then you're playing on low effect. Increase it and it's same.
fine it was her w... and no I am not playing on low effect, I am playing on the highest effect. Everything adjusted to the highest.

> [{quoted}](name=Asul,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=pRQ7jRpy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-08-23T21:41:10.189+0000)
>
> fine it was her w... and no I am not playing on low effect, I am playing on the highest effect. Everything adjusted to the highest.

then something is wrong. I didn't care about it, so i dont know i have same problem or not.
